member.name: T:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.HamburgerMenuEx
member.summary: Represents a container that enables navigation of app content. It has a header, a view for the main content, and a menu pane for navigation commands.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HamburgerMenuEx class.

member.summary: Identifies the IsBackButtonVisible dependency property.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.HamburgerMenuEx.IsBackButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the back button is visible or collapsed.
member.returns: true if the back button is visible; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: F:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.HamburgerMenuEx.IsBackEnabledProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsBackEnabled dependency property.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.HamburgerMenuEx.IsBackEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the back button is enabled or disabled.
member.returns: true if the back button is enabled; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.HamburgerMenuEx.HeaderTemplate

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.HamburgerMenuEx.PaneTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the label adjacent to the menu icon when the pane is open.
member.returns: The label adjacent to the menu icon when the pane is open. The default is an empty string.
